name: Lost Mine of Phandelver
description: A classic starter adventure set in the frontier town of Phandalin. The party must investigate the disappearance of Gundren Rockseeker and uncover the secrets of Wave Echo Cave.
seed_content: The adventure begins in the town of Neverwinter, where the party has been hired by Gundren Rockseeker, a dwarf prospector, to escort a wagon of supplies to the frontier town of Phandalin. Gundren and his bodyguard Sildar Hallwinter have gone ahead on horseback. The journey takes you along the High Road, through the Neverwinter Wood, and eventually to Phandalin. However, along the way, you discover that Gundren and Sildar have been ambushed by goblins. The adventure involves investigating the goblin threat, exploring the Cragmaw Hideout, and eventually discovering the location of Wave Echo Cave, a lost mine filled with ancient magic and danger.
